contactUs: ទំនាក់ទំនងពួកយើង
welcome: សូមស្វាគមន៍មកកាន់
detail_1: was founded in early 2025 by a passionate Cambodian woman entrepreneur. Recognizing the challenges modern women face—juggling work, family, and personal care—the owner envisioned a sanctuary where women could feel beautiful and rejuvenated despite their busy lives. At BPP Spa and Salon, we offer exceptional services from head to toe, including hair, eyes, facial, armpit, nail, and body spa treatments. Conveniently located in a shop house at Borey Vimean Phnom Penh 598 project, we are your go-to destination for beauty and relaxation.
btn_book_now: កក់ឥឡូវនេះ
btn_book_now_1: ធ្វើការកក់ឥឡូវនេះ
btn_buy_1: ធ្វើការបញ្ជាទិញ
al_detail: We believe everyone deserves to feel pampered without breaking the bank. Our services are high-quality yet affordable, making beauty and relaxation accessible to all.
es_detail: From head to toe, we deliver top-notch treatments tailored to your needs. Our skilled professionals ensure you leave feeling refreshed, confident, and beautiful.
pqp_detail: We use only the best products to ensure your safety, comfort, and stunning results. Your beauty and well-being are our top priorities.
ifa_detail: We welcome everyone—women, men, and all genders. Our services are designed to make everyone feel special, confident, and cared for.
exp_twapt: Expert Team with a Personal Touch
exp_twapt_detail: Our passionate and highly trained team takes the time to understand your needs, ensuring a personalized experience every time you visit.
footer_quote: Recognizing the challenges modern women face—juggling work, family, and personal care—the owner envisioned a sanctuary where women could feel beautiful and rejuvenated despite their busy lives. At BPP Spa and Salon, we offer exceptional services from head to toe, including hair, eyes, facial, armpit, nail, and body spa treatments.
vision_detail: Our vision is to provide the best services, making every client feel special, confident, and beautiful.
mission_statement_detail: To empower women by offering exceptional beauty and spa services that help them look and feel their best, no matter how busy life gets.
fbp_detail: Our plan is to scale our operations and open branches in 25 provinces nationwide.
